blogData.title: We Have An Explainer Video
blogData.keywords: Sydney, explainer video, explainer, platform, video, translation, transcribing, AI artificial intelligence, SaaS, software as a service, video and audio content, video content, audio content, translate, transcribe, youtube subtitles, video caption, youtube captions

data.richContent:
We are a Sydney based, media focused technology platform provider, looking to make the world a more accessible place. Our primary value proposition is a transcription and translation platform, with a focus on audio and video content.

Video Translator’s translation platform (“the application”) is an Internet-enabled SaaS (Software as a Service) platform which assists content creators (“the client”) to engage with stakeholders (“the audience”) from different linguistic backgrounds. The application is used to convert hypermedia content from one language to another, using an Artificial Intelligence (AI) assisted process.

Explainer Video

We are super excited to announce that we have an explainer video finally, all thanks to the wonderful Tarryn Myburgh at TMCreates.

Did you like it? Let us know what you think!

Conclusion

Please connect with us on LinkedIn, YouTube or Facebook for any comments, questions, or just to keep up to date with the work we do!

We are very grateful for your support!

We hope you enjoyed our explainer video. Feedback or Questions? We’d love to hear from you. Do let us know at hello@videotranslator.ai.

nodes.title: Maximizing Video Marketing: 5 Tips for A Successful Business in 2024
nodes.description: Video marketing has become the heart of digital marketing campaigns. Video marketing offers various benefits for your business, from rising brand awareness to boosting SEO and sales. In the following blog post, you will learn 5 tips to maximize your video marketing in 2024.
nodes.coverAlt: Maximizing Video Marketing: 5 Tips for A Successful Business in 2024

nodes.title: The Implications Of AI Adoption In Our Tools
nodes.description: AI transcription is now a standard feature in productivity toolkits. What does this mean for your business?
nodes.coverAlt: The Implications Of AI Adoption In Our Tools

nodes.title: How NSW Health Is Using Video Translation To Empower Occupational Therapists
nodes.description: Working with developmentally challenged children is very rewarding work. Read how NSW Health is using video translation to help its occupational therapists.
nodes.coverAlt: How NSW Health Is Using Video Translation
